sentences.sContent: There was no trace of anyone having entered the room since then.
sentences.sCn: 没有任何迹象表明在那以后有人进过这房间。

sentences.sContent: Petra’s lost all trace of her German accent.
sentences.sCn: 彼得拉已完全没有德国口音。

sentences.sContent: Officers were unable to find any trace of drugs.
sentences.sCn: 警察未能找到毒品的蛛丝马迹。

synos.tran: [法]痕迹，踪迹；[气象]微量；[仪]迹线；缰绳

phrases.pCn: 无影无踪地；渺无踪迹地
不着痕迹地；了无踪迹地

remMethod.val: 跑(race)道上没有留下蛛丝马迹(trace)

words.tran: 起源于；可追踪的；可描绘的
追踪；追查；描摹；摹图；显迹
[核] 示踪物；追踪者；描图者；（铁笔等）绘图工具
追溯（trace的过去分词）；跟踪；摹写

trans.tranCn: 痕迹， 踪迹；极少量， 微量
trans.tranOther: a small sign that shows that someone or something was present or existed
to copy a drawing, map etc by putting a piece of transparent paper over it and then drawing the lines you can see through the paper
